messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] an insight?
messages.msgSnippet: -=-i was interested in india last month why do i have to do it now?-=- I hope you said You don t have to, you chose to go to school where other people make
messages.messageBody:
-=-i was interested in india last month why do i have to do it now?-=-
I hope you said "You don't "have to," you chose to go to school where
other people make your schedule. You could come back home!"

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: an insight?
messages.msgSnippet: hi all, I have unschooled all my children but my eldest dd 8 has decided she wants to see how things are at school.  Here are a couple of thoughts on the
messages.messageBody:
hi all,
I have unschooled all my children but my eldest dd 8 has decided she wants to see how things are at school. Here are a couple of thoughts on the matter. She has done a week and 2 days. She is enjoying it (so far) and wants to continue.....I'll let you know how things progress.


Thoughts on her day:
(tick tick tick tick - to be said s-l-o-w-l-y)

-lessons go-tick tick tick tick.....assembly time
-assembly is over in a second
lessons go-tick tick tick tick.....playtime
-playtime is over in a second
-lessons go-tick tick tick tick....dinnertime
dinnertime is over in a second......etc...etc..

She is doing a topic on inidia:
-boring
-i was interested in india last month why do i have to do it now?



interesting insight huh?
blessings
michelle
